DOC.brief_summary: This Phase IIa proof-of-concept study evaluate effect oral QLT091001 adult impair dark adaptation .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effects Oral QLT091001 Adults With Impaired Dark Adaptation
DOC.detailed_description: This proof-of-concept study randomize , parallel design two different oral dos QLT091001 compare placebo evaluate treatment effect patient impaired dark adaptation . Approximately 40 subject enrol study approximately 7 center US .
